meanings.definition: Situated at the rear or end
meanings.sent1: The aftermost seat on the bus was next to the window.
meanings.sent2: The aftermost car of the train was the caboose.
meanings.sent3: The aftermost slice of cake was saved for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The aftermost star in the sky twinkled faintly.
meanings.sent5: The aftermost room in the house had a beautiful view of the garden.

meanings.definition: Last in a series or sequence
meanings.sent1: The aftermost player to arrive missed the team photo.
meanings.sent2: The aftermost chapter of the book revealed the surprising twist.
meanings.sent3: The aftermost cookie in the jar mysteriously disappeared overnight.
meanings.sent4: The aftermost runner in the race sprinted to the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The aftermost question on the test was the most challenging.
